Title: 🖼 The Defense Ministry's rehabilitation center has treated appro...
Description: The Defense Ministry's rehabilitation center has treated approximately 10,056 soldiers since the war began on October 7. Of these, 35% are dealing with PTSD or other trauma-related mental disorders, while 37% have sustained physical injuries, particularly to their limbs. About 68% of the treated soldiers are reservists. Title: Israeli Police Spokesperson's Unit: This afternoon (Wednesday, Au...
Description: Israeli Police Spokesperson's Unit:This afternoon (Wednesday, August 14), the police will conduct an operational readiness exercise in Jerusalem and its surrounding areas.The exercise, scheduled from 4:30 PM to 6:00 PM, will involve increased activity of police and Border Police forces in the cities of Jerusalem, Beit Shemesh, and the communities in the Jerusalem Hills and Mateh Yehuda region. This pre-planned exercise aims to enhance the operational readiness and coordination of the police forces and the civilian response teams, known as kitot konenut, in the Jerusalem district to effectively manage emergency and extreme situations.No major traffic routes in the area are expected to be blocked during the exercise. We urge the public to adhere to the instructions provided by officers on the ground.MSGT. Dean Elsdunne, Israel Police International Spokesperson: -The safety and security of our communities are are among our top priorities. This exercise is crucial for ensuring that our forces are prepared to respond swiftly and effectively to any emergency situation. We appreciate the public's cooperation and understanding as we work to maintain peace and safety in the region.-WHATSAPP GROUP 🔗 https://chat.whatsapp.com/GmbUPJXCg678NpL1mQ3pnETELEGRAM 🔗 https://t.me/JewishBreakingNewsTelegramWHATSAPP CHANNEL 🔗 https://whatsapp.com/channel/0029Va4EEJU7YSdAqzGs362FSTATUS 🔗 https://wa.me/message/2BHKFPEVQP3FK1
